text: Helicophanta souverbiana is a species of air-breathing land snail, a terrestrial pulmonate gastropods mollusk in the family Acavidae. The species occurs in Madagascar. == Subspecies == * Helicophanta souverbiana souverbiana (Fischer, 1860) * Helicophanta souverbiana audiberi Mousson, 1882Liggia B. "Helicophanta souverbiana". WMSD - Worldwide mollusc species DB, last updated 30 October 2013, accessed 7 November 2014. ==References== Category:Acavidae Category:Gastropods described in 1860
title: Helicophanta souverbiana
